thread.title: Janet Jackson carries a £50,000 Hermes handbag in London
thread.title_full: Janet Jackson carries a £50,000 Hermes handbag in London | Daily Mail Online

author: Dan Cain For Mailonline
title: Janet Jackson carries a £50,000 Hermes handbag in London
text:
She's a first time mum at the age of 50.
And Janet Jackson enjoyed some time away from her parenting duties on Tuesday as she was joined by her mum Katherine, 86, and sister Rebbie, 66, in central London .
The singer stepped out for some retail therapy in a lavish fur cloak and a comfortable all-black ensemble.
Scroll down for video
Wrapped up: Janet Jackson, 50, enjoyed some time away from her parenting duties on Tuesday as she was joined by her mum Katherine, 86, and sister Rebbie, 66, in central London
The piece de resistance of her outfit was undoubtedly her £50,000 Hermes Belkin alligator handbag.
Janet wore her hair in an updo and sported a pair of rectangular-rimmed glasses. She chatted on her phone as she left her residence, walking in a pair of black platform heels.
The songstress and her husband Wissam Al Mana, 42, welcomed their son Eissa on January 3rd.
A source told E! News : 'She is totally in love. She is taking time to just be with her baby at this time and that's all she really wants.'
Furry nice: The singer stepped out for some retail therapy in a lavish fur cloak and a comfortable all-black ensemble
'Janet and her baby are doing well,' the insider added. 'She has hired help at home and her husband has been with her through it all.'
'It was a difficult pregnancy but she is very blessed and has a healthy baby. She has great doctors. A select few have seen her baby. She is so excited to be a mom.'
The source also added that the newborn 'looks like Janet in so many ways with a touch of her man.'
Designer: The piece de resistance of her outfit was undoubtedly her £50,000 Hermes Belkin alligator handbag
The couple announced the exciting news with a spokesperson saying: 'Janet Jackson and husband Wissam Al Mana are thrilled to welcome their new son Eissa Al Mana into the world.
'Janet had a stress-free, healthy delivery and is resting comfortably.’
She announced she was delaying her Unbreakable World Tour because of the birth but promised she would see her fans as soon as she could.
Stepping out: She chatted on her phone as she left her residence, walking in a pair of black platform heels
